title: Gemini CLI Skills Integration
description: Gemini CLI released a new skills feature that integrates with Claude Code and other software workflows, enhancing extensibility and interoperability. YouTube videos from recent days cover the 'Agent Skills' feature.

community_feedback.quote: Gemini CLI users, is it actually better than Claude Code for coding?
CLI UX from best to worst: Gemini → Claude → Codex. This might be the only time Google is superior on product.
The problem with gemini is the performance drops after some time, the time to respond is more, and it is still hallucinating

title: New CLI Features and MCP Management
description: Cursor introduced new CLI controls for models, MCP (Model Context Protocol) management, enhanced rules and commands, and improved CLI performance. Hooks are now 10-20x faster with new commands like /rules and /mcp enable/disable.

community_feedback.quote: This is currently the only tool that can match Claude Code. It's better than Codex, Gemini CLI. It's also very timely in supporting new technologies, first to support Subagent, Skills.

title: Codex CLI Updates 0.78.0 - 0.80.0
description: OpenAI released multiple Codex CLI versions between January 6-9 featuring external-editor editing (Ctrl+G), project-aware config, and branching threads capability. External editor support described as 'a major UX win'.

community_feedback.quote: Codex CLI seems off after last updates - tasks completing very fast and poorly, MCPs not being used unless mentioned, and skills not loading properly

title: Gemini 3 Grounding with Google Search Billing
description: Google began billing for Gemini 3 Grounding with Google Search services, affecting how the CLI interacts with enterprise search features starting January 5, 2026.

title: Aider MCP Server Update
description: Aider received an update to its MCP (Model Context Protocol) server, enhancing integration capabilities with the broader AI development ecosystem. Multiple MCP servers for Aider now available including git-commit functionality.

title: Cursor 2.3 - Layout Customization and Stability Improvements
description: Cursor released version 2.3 with layout customization options and significant stability improvements, focusing on making the IDE feel more solid for daily use.

title: Gemini 3 Flash Integration
description: Google integrated Gemini 3 Flash into Gemini CLI, offering enhanced performance in reasoning, tool use, and multimodal capabilities. Raises the 'performance floor' of coding sessions.

title: GitHub Cloud Agent Preview in Visual Studio 2026
description: GitHub introduced Cloud Agent in preview for Visual Studio 2026, enabling autonomous AI agents to handle repetitive tasks like UI cleanups, refactors, and documentation updates. Available via Copilot badge dropdown settings.
